plot: After a tumultuous year, Vicki Gunvalson has a romantic surprise in store for her husband. Lynne Curtin agrees to allow Gretchen to take her teenage daughter Alexa shopping, and the Bellinos take their kids to church.

Lydia looks forward to taking all the ladies on a ski vacation to Whistler, Canada. Alexis hopes for a conflict-free trip, but Heather and Gretchen tussle over who was really offered a coveted sitcom role. Meanwhile, Tamra hears the raunchy gossip that Lauri has been spreading about Vicki and sets off an avalanche of screams when she spills the beans to Vicki.—Anonymous
